subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Kohlschreiber won his sixth career ATP title by rallying to defeat the French qualifier Paul-Henri Mathieu, 2-6, 6-2, 6-2, on Saturday at the Generali Open in Kitzbühel, Austria.
snippet: Kohlschreiber won his sixth career ATP title by rallying to defeat the French qualifier Paul-Henri Mathieu, 2-6, 6-2, 6-2, on Saturday at the Generali Open in Kitzbühel, Austria.
